swayambhu_stupa.name: Swayambhu Crystal Stupa
swayambhu_stupa.description: An ancient stupa atop a hill, radiating mystical energy. The crystal dome captures moonlight and transforms it into healing waves.

celestial_gardens.name: Celestial Gardens
celestial_gardens.description: Floating gardens where starflowers bloom and cosmic butterflies dance through ethereal mists.

crystal_pavilion.name: Crystal Pavilion of Echoes
crystal_pavilion.description: A structure made entirely of singing crystals that resonate with ancient melodies.

astral_observatory.name: Astral Observatory
astral_observatory.description: Where celestial monks map the movements of cosmic bodies and predict otherworldly events.

dream_pools.name: Dream Pools
dream_pools.description: Shimmering pools where dreams take physical form and can be walked through like mist.

harmony_bridge.name: Harmony Bridge
harmony_bridge.description: A bridge woven from light and sound, where every step creates musical notes.

mystic_forge.name: Mystic Forge
mystic_forge.description: Where elemental smiths craft items using pure magical energies and stardust.

starweaver_sanctum.name: Starweaver Sanctum
starweaver_sanctum.description: A dome where cosmic energies are woven into powerful enchantments and blessings.

void_gate.name: Void Gate
void_gate.description: An ancient portal said to connect to other realms and dimensions.

memory_maze.name: Memory Maze
memory_maze.description: A labyrinth where past events replay themselves in misty apparitions.

twilight_court.name: Twilight Court
twilight_court.description: Where day and night exist simultaneously, and twilight beings hold their revels.

resonance_tower.name: Resonance Tower
resonance_tower.description: A tower that channels and amplifies magical energies through musical vibrations.

echo_gardens.name: Echo Gardens
echo_gardens.description: Gardens where whispered secrets from centuries past can still be heard.

artificer_quarter.name: Artificer Quarter
artificer_quarter.description: Where magical inventors create impossible devices and enchanted machines.

phoenix_spire.name: Phoenix Spire
phoenix_spire.description: A tower perpetually wreathed in magical flames where fire mages study.

celestial_library.name: Celestial Library
celestial_library.description: Where stories write themselves in starlight and books float through constellation-lit halls.

moonlight_pavilion.name: Moonlight Pavilion
moonlight_pavilion.description: A gathering place where moonlight is collected and used to brew magical elixirs.

gateway_district.name: Gateway District
gateway_district.description: A maze of smaller portals connecting different parts of the city instantaneously.

shadow_market.name: Shadow Market
shadow_market.description: A market that only appears in shadows, where rare and mysterious items are traded.

time_weavers_hall.name: Time Weavers Hall
time_weavers_hall.description: Where chronom√°ncers study and maintain the flows of time throughout the city.

reflection_pools.name: Reflection Pools
reflection_pools.description: Pools that show not your reflection, but glimpses of other times and places.

dusk_gardens.name: Dusk Gardens
dusk_gardens.description: Gardens that exist in perpetual sunset, where shadow flowers bloom eternally.

astral_plaza.name: Astral Plaza
astral_plaza.description: A grand plaza where the ground reflects the stars above, creating the illusion of walking through space.

song_smith_quarter.name: Song Smith Quarter
song_smith_quarter.description: Where magical instruments are crafted and music takes physical form.
